page.shortlink: form layout multicondition container properties properties
page.description: Settings for configuring a MultiCondition Control.

discussion.p: A *[ui:[MultiCondition]]* container is used to conditionally display sets of controls in a FormView container. The Multi-Condition Container Properties are used to define the style of a *[ui:[MultiCondition]]* container.

description.p: Defines one or more classes to apply to the Container.
Specify in-line CSS for styling the container.
